question: Famous cricket coach Ramakant Achrekar belongs to which state of India?
explanation: Famous cricket coach Ramakant Achrekar belongs to the state of Maharashtra. He was born in Malvan, Maharashtra. He passed away recently. He coached prominent players like Sachin Tendulkar, Vinod Kambli, Pravin Amre. He was awarded Padma Shri in 2010.
